Package com.ykb.posnet.merchant.sample.xml

This package includes classes that demonstrate sample code to send valid XML documents to Posnet XML Service.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
RequestBean This class holds details of a posnet XML service request.
RequestMaker This class provides methods to prepare an xml string suitable to send to Posnet XML service.
ResponseParser Sample Posnet XML Service client which provides methods to parse Posnet XML service responses.
XMLConstants XML constants used throughout xml samples.
 

Package com.ykb.posnet.merchant.sample.xml Description

This package includes classes that demonstrate sample code to send valid XML documents to Posnet XML Service. These classes are also used as utility classes by some of the classes in com.ykb.posnet.merchant package.
